subject: Bestellung #SSN4669
description_text:
Hello,

I would like to cancel my order. I accidentally ordered the wrong pedals, and unfortunately they are not compatible.

Best regards,
David

conversations.body_text: Hi D. leyser,    Okay, we've paused your order for you. We're sorry to hear that. Would you like to cancel the entire order, or just the pedal?
Hello, Thank you. Yes I would like cancel the entire order. Sorry Best regards David Gesendet mit der GMX Mail App Am 15.12.25 um 10:26 schrieb support@simsonn.com
Hi D. leyser,     Alright, we'll cancel it for you.
Hi, You have canceled the order? Looks like I did not get an refund at PayPal? Best regards David Gesendet mit der GMX Mail App Am 15.12.25 um 11:42 schrieb support@simsonn.com
Hi D. leyser,    I apologize for the delay in processing your refund. I have now issued the refund. Please check your account.
